content.title: Celiac Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Third most common visceral artery aneurysm, often associated with median arcuate ligament compression.

treatment_approach.endovascular_first: Preferred when feasible due to complex open exposure
treatment_approach.open_considerations: May require division of median arcuate ligament

content.clinical_pearl: Evaluate for MALS-associated aneurysm which may require ligament release in addition to aneurysm repair
content.statement: Celiac Artery Aneurysm is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Mesenteric that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
